freemarker.debug

Interface DebuggerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface DebuggerListener
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener
    An interface for components that wish to receive debugging events.
    Author:
    Attila Szegedi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void environmentSuspended(EnvironmentSuspendedEvent e)
      Called whenever an environment gets suspended (ie hits a breakpoint).
